result.title: Traveling Salesman + New Constraint, help?
result.content:
With the original traveling salesman problem, you are given a new constraint â€” you can skip up to M of the cities that you will travel to.

I'm completely stuck in regards to this new approach. I know that you should definitely skip M amount of cities, but don't know how to find which cities to skip. Please help!

Edit: Forgot to mention problem constraints

50 > Cities > M

75 >= Roads
